  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nf">syncRedmineIssues</span><span class="p">();</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Testa performance de cada componente individualmente
 * @returns {Object} Resultado dos testes de performance
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">testPerformance</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">⚡ Iniciando testes de performance...</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">results</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{};</span>

  <span class="c1">// Teste de chamados abertos</span>
  <span class="nf">startPerformanceTracking</span><span class="p">();</span>
  <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">openIssues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">fetchIssues</span><span class="p">({</span> <span class="na">closedOnly</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">false</span> <span class="p">});</span>
    <span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">openIssues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="na">success</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">count</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">openIssues</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">performance</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nf">endPerformanceTracking</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="p">};</span>
  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">openIssues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="na">success</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">error</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">performance</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nf">endPerformanceTracking</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="p">};</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="c1">// Teste de chamados fechados</span>
  <span class="nf">startPerformanceTracking</span><span class="p">();</span>
  <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">closedIssues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">fetchIssues</span><span class="p">({</span> <span class="na">closedOnly</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">true</span> <span class="p">});</span>
    <span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">closedIssues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="na">success</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">count</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">closedIssues</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">performance</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nf">endPerformanceTracking</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="p">};</span>
  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">closedIssues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="na">success</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">error</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">performance</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nf">endPerformanceTracking</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="p">};</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="c1">// Teste de time entries</span>
  <span class="nf">startPerformanceTracking</span><span class="p">();</span>
  <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">timeEntries</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">fetchTimeEntries</span><span class="p">();</span>
    <span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">timeEntries</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="na">success</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">count</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">timeEntries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">performance</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nf">endPerformanceTracking</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="p">};</span>
  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">timeEntries</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="na">success</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">error</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">performance</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nf">endPerformanceTracking</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="p">};</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">📊 Resultados dos testes de performance:</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nb">Object</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">keys</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">forEach</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">key</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nx">key</span><span class="p">];</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">success</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`  - </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">key</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">count</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2"> registros em </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">performance</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">totalTime</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">ms`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`  - </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">key</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">: ❌ </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">error</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>
  <span class="p">});</span>

  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</code></pre></div></li>
		<li>Config.gs <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-fdb8daca-show, #collapse-fdb8daca-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-fdb8daca&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-fdb8daca-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-fdb8daca-show, #collapse-fdb8daca-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-fdb8daca&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-fdb8daca-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-fdb8daca" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><pre><code class="javascript syntaxhl" data-language="javascript"><span class="c1">// Config.gs</span>
<span class="c1">// Configurações e constantes do sistema</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// CONFIGURAÇÕES DA API REDMINE</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">REDMINE_API_URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">https://siacon.redmineup.com/projects/ao3/issues</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">REDMINE_TIME_ENTRIES_URL</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">https://siacon.redmineup.com/time_entries</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">;</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// CONFIGURAÇÕES DE TIMEOUT</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">TIMEOUTS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="na">API_REQUEST</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">15000</span><span class="p">,</span>      <span class="c1">// 15 segundos para requisições da API</span>
  <span class="na">SHEET_OPERATION</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">10000</span><span class="p">,</span>  <span class="c1">// 10 segundos para operações de planilha</span>
  <span class="na">TIME_ENTRIES</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">8000</span>       <span class="c1">// 8 segundos para time entries</span>
<span class="p">};</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// CONFIGURAÇÕES DE LIMITES</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">LIMITS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="na">ISSUES</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span>             <span class="c1">// Limite de issues por requisição</span>
  <span class="na">TIME_ENTRIES</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">100</span>        <span class="c1">// Limite de time entries por requisição</span>
<span class="p">};</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// GESTÃO DA API KEY</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Obtém a API Key das propriedades do script
 * @returns {string} A API Key do Redmine
 * @throws {Error} Se a API Key não estiver configurada
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">getRedmineApiKey</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">apiKey</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">PropertiesService</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getScriptProperties</span><span class="p">().</span><span class="nf">getProperty</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">REDMINE_API_KEY</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">apiKey</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="k">throw</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Error</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">REDMINE_API_KEY não configurada. Configure em: Arquivo &gt; Propriedades do projeto &gt; Propriedades do script</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>
  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">apiKey</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Configura a API Key nas propriedades do script
 * @param {string} apiKey - A chave da API do Redmine
 * @returns {boolean} true se configurado com sucesso
 * @throws {Error} Se a API Key estiver vazia
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">setupRedmineApiKey</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">apiKey</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">apiKey</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">apiKey</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">trim</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="dl">''</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="k">throw</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Error</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">API Key não pode estar vazia</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="nx">PropertiesService</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getScriptProperties</span><span class="p">().</span><span class="nf">setProperty</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">REDMINE_API_KEY</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">apiKey</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">✅ REDMINE_API_KEY configurada com sucesso</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Verifica se a API Key está configurada corretamente
 * @returns {boolean} true se configurada, false caso contrário
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">checkRedmineApiKey</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nf">getRedmineApiKey</span><span class="p">();</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">✅ REDMINE_API_KEY está configurada corretamente</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">;</span>
  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">❌ ERRO: </span><span class="dl">'</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1">// Constante que obtém a API Key dinamicamente</span>
<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">REDMINE_API_KEY</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">getRedmineApiKey</span><span class="p">();</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Validação completa da configuração do sistema
 * @returns {Object} Resultado da validação
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">validateSystemConfiguration</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">validation</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="na">success</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="na">errors</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[],</span>
    <span class="na">warnings</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
  <span class="p">};</span>

  <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="c1">// Verifica API Key</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nf">checkRedmineApiKey</span><span class="p">())</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">success</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">errors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">API Key não configurada</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="c1">// Verifica URLs</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_API_URL</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_TIME_ENTRIES_URL</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">success</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">errors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">URLs da API não configuradas</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="c1">// Verifica IDs de usuários</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">ASSIGNED_TO_IDS</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">ASSIGNED_TO_IDS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">warnings</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">Nenhum ID de usuário configurado</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nf">validateUserIds</span><span class="p">())</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">errors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">IDs de usuários inválidos detectados</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="c1">// Verifica nomes das planilhas</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">SHEET_NAME</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">CLOSED_SHEET_NAME</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">TIME_ENTRIES_SHEET_NAME</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">success</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">errors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">Nomes das planilhas não configurados</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="c1">// Testa conexão com API</span>
    <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">testUrl</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_API_URL</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">.json?key=</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_API_KEY</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">&amp;limit=1`</span><span class="p">;</span>
      <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">UrlFetchApp</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">fetch</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">testUrl</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="na">muteHttpExceptions</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="na">timeout</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">TIMEOUTS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">API_REQUEST</span>
      <span class="p">});</span>

      <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">response</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getResponseCode</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">!==</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">warnings</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`API retornou status </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">response</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getResponseCode</span><span class="p">()}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
      <span class="p">}</span>
    <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">warnings</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`Erro ao testar API: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`🔍 Validação do sistema: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">success</span> <span class="p">?</span> <span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">✅ OK</span><span class="dl">'</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">❌ FALHOU</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">errors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`❌ Erros: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">errors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">join</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">, </span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">)}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">warnings</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`⚠️ Avisos: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">warnings</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">join</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">, </span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">)}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">;</span>

  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`💥 Erro na validação: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="na">success</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">errors</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">`Erro crítico: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">],</span>
      <span class="na">warnings</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
    <span class="p">};</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// CONFIGURAÇÕES DE USUÁRIOS</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">ASSIGNED_TO_IDS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">118</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">314</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">363</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">364</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">358</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">285</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">335</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">367</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">368</span><span class="p">];</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Valida se todos os IDs de usuários são números inteiros válidos
 * @returns {boolean} true se todos os IDs são válidos
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">validateUserIds</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">ASSIGNED_TO_IDS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">every</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">id</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="nb">Number</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">isInteger</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">id</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="nx">id</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// CONFIGURAÇÕES DAS PLANILHAS</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">SHEET_NAME</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Chamados Abertos</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">CLOSED_SHEET_NAME</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Chamados Fechados</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">TIME_ENTRIES_SHEET_NAME</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Tempo Gasto</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">;</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// CONFIGURAÇÕES DE CAMPOS E COLUNAS</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Campos customizados do Redmine que devem ser incluídos nas colunas
 */</span>
<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">CUSTOM_FIELDS_TO_INCLUDE</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Sistema</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Usuário</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span> 
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Telefone</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Atendimento</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Grupo Cliente</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Componente</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Origem</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Chamado VLI</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Rastreamento CS</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Tipo de chamado</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Categoria Solução</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Canal de acionamento</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="p">];</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Cabeçalhos base para as planilhas de chamados
 */</span>
<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">BASE_HEADERS</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">ID</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Projeto</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Tracker</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span> 
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Status</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Prioridade</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Autor</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Atribuído a</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Assunto</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Data Início</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Data Final</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Concluído (%)</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Privado</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Horas Estimadas</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Horas Totais Estimadas</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Horas Gastas</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Horas Totais Gastas</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Data Criação</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Data Atualização</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Status Fechado</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
<span class="p">];</span>
</code></pre></div></li>
		<li>RedmineService.gs <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-aba8b6fb-show, #collapse-aba8b6fb-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-aba8b6fb&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-aba8b6fb-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-aba8b6fb-show, #collapse-aba8b6fb-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-aba8b6fb&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-aba8b6fb-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-aba8b6fb" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><pre><code class="javascript syntaxhl" data-language="javascript"><span class="c1">// RedmineService.gs</span>
<span class="c1">// Integração com a API do Redmine</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// MÉTRICAS DE PERFORMANCE</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">performanceMetrics</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="na">startTime</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="na">requests</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="na">totalTime</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
<span class="p">};</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Inicia métricas de performance
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">startPerformanceTracking</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="nx">performanceMetrics</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="na">startTime</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Date</span><span class="p">(),</span>
    <span class="na">requests</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="na">totalTime</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
  <span class="p">};</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Finaliza e retorna métricas de performance
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">endPerformanceTracking</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">performanceMetrics</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">startTime</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">performanceMetrics</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">totalTime</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Date</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="nx">performanceMetrics</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">startTime</span><span class="p">;</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>
  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">performanceMetrics</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// FUNÇÕES DE CABEÇALHOS E ESTRUTURA</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Gera cabeçalhos para as planilhas baseado no tipo de dados
 * @param {boolean} closedOnly - Se deve incluir coluna de data de fechamento
 * @returns {Array} Array com os cabeçalhos das colunas
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">getHeaders</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">closedOnly</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">baseHeaders</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[...</span><span class="nx">BASE_HEADERS</span><span class="p">];</span>
  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">closedOnly</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="nx">baseHeaders</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Data de Fechamento</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">[...</span><span class="nx">baseHeaders</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">...</span><span class="nx">CUSTOM_FIELDS_TO_INCLUDE</span><span class="p">];</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// FUNÇÕES DE BUSCA DE DADOS OTIMIZADAS</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Busca issues (chamados) do Redmine via API
 * @param {Object} options - Opções de busca
 * @param {boolean} options.closedOnly - Se deve buscar apenas chamados fechados
 * @returns {Array} Array de issues do Redmine
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">fetchIssues</span><span class="p">({</span> <span class="nx">closedOnly</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span> <span class="p">}</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{})</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">url</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_API_URL</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">.json?key=</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_API_KEY</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">&amp;include=custom_fields&amp;limit=</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">LIMITS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">ISSUES</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">;</span>

  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">closedOnly</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">url</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="s2">`&amp;status_id=closed&amp;closed_on=t`</span><span class="p">;</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="nx">performanceMetrics</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">requests</span><span class="o">++</span><span class="p">;</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">startTime</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Date</span><span class="p">();</span>

  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">UrlFetchApp</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">fetch</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="na">muteHttpExceptions</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="na">headers</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Content-Type</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">application/json</span><span class="dl">"</span> <span class="p">},</span>
    <span class="na">timeout</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">TIMEOUTS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">API_REQUEST</span>
  <span class="p">});</span>

  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">requestTime</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Date</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="nx">startTime</span><span class="p">;</span>
  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`⏱️ Requisição issues: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">requestTime</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">ms`</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">response</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getResponseCode</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">!==</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="k">throw</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Error</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`HTTP </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">response</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getResponseCode</span><span class="p">()}</span><span class="s2">: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">response</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getContentText</span><span class="p">()}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">responseText</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">response</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getContentText</span><span class="p">();</span>
  <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">responseData</span><span class="p">;</span>

  <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">responseData</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">JSON</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">parse</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">responseText</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="k">throw</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Error</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`Resposta da API inválida: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">issues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">responseData</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">issues</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="p">[];</span>

  <span class="c1">// Filtra por usuários específicos</span>
  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">ASSIGNED_TO_IDS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">issues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">issues</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">filter</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span>
      <span class="nx">ASSIGNED_TO_IDS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">includes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">assigned_to</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">id</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="c1">// Filtro adicional para chamados fechados</span>
  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">closedOnly</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">issues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">issues</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">filter</span><span class="p">(</span>
      <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">status</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">is_closed</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="kc">true</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">closed_on</span>
    <span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">issues</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Processa campos customizados de um issue
 * @param {Object} issue - Issue do Redmine
 * @returns {Object} Objeto com campos customizados mapeados
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">parseCustomFields</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">customFields</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{};</span>

  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">Array</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">isArray</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">custom_fields</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">custom_fields</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">forEach</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="nx">field</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">customFields</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nx">field</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">name</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">field</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">value</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="p">});</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">customFields</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// FUNÇÕES DE TEMPO GASTO OTIMIZADAS</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Retorna os cabeçalhos para a planilha de Tempo Gasto
 * @returns {Array} Array com os cabeçalhos das colunas
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">getTimeEntriesHeaders</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">[</span>
    <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">ID Lançamento</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Projeto</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">ID Chamado</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Usuário</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Atividade</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Horas</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Comentários</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Data</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="p">];</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Retorna a data de ontem no formato YYYY-MM-DD
 * @returns {string} Data de ontem formatada
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">getYesterdayDateString</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">today</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Date</span><span class="p">();</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">yesterday</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Date</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">today</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nx">yesterday</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">setDate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">today</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getDate</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="c1">// Usa timezone local em vez de UTC para evitar problemas de data</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">timezone</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">Session</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getScriptTimeZone</span><span class="p">();</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">yesterdayFormatted</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">Utilities</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">formatDate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">yesterday</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">timezone</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">yyyy-MM-dd</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📅 Data atual: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">Utilities</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">formatDate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">today</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">timezone</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">yyyy-MM-dd</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">)}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📅 Data de ontem calculada: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">yesterdayFormatted</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">yesterdayFormatted</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1">// Funções removidas - não são mais necessárias</span>
<span class="c1">// O sistema agora busca apenas do dia anterior de forma direta</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Busca time entries do dia anterior (simplificado)
 * @returns {Array} Array de time entries do Redmine
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">fetchTimeEntriesIntelligent</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="c1">// Busca apenas do dia anterior</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">yesterdayStr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">getYesterdayDateString</span><span class="p">();</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📅 Buscando time entries do dia anterior: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">yesterdayStr</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>

    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">entries</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">fetchTimeEntriesByUsersAndDateOptimized</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">yesterdayStr</span><span class="p">);</span>

    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">entries</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`✅ Encontrados </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2"> entries do dia anterior`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📊 Nenhum entry encontrado do dia anterior`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">entries</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="p">[];</span>

  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`💥 Erro na busca de time entries: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">[];</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Busca os lançamentos de horas (time entries) do dia anterior
 * @returns {Array} Array de time entries do Redmine
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">fetchTimeEntries</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="c1">// Busca apenas do dia anterior</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nf">fetchTimeEntriesIntelligent</span><span class="p">();</span>
  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`❌ Erro em fetchTimeEntries: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">[];</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Busca time entries com retry inteligente e métricas (otimizado)
 * @param {string} userId - ID do usuário
 * @param {string} date - Data para buscar
 * @param {number} retryCount - Número de tentativas
 * @returns {Array} Array de time entries do usuário
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">fetchTimeEntriesForUser</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">userId</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">retryCount</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">maxRetries</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// Reduzido para 1 tentativa</span>

  <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">baseUrl</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_TIME_ENTRIES_URL</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">.json?key=</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_API_KEY</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">&amp;user_id=</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">userId</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">&amp;spent_on=</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">&amp;limit=</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">LIMITS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">TIME_ENTRIES</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="nx">performanceMetrics</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">requests</span><span class="o">++</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">startTime</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Date</span><span class="p">();</span>

    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">UrlFetchApp</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">fetch</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">baseUrl</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="na">muteHttpExceptions</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">headers</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Content-Type</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">application/json</span><span class="dl">"</span> <span class="p">},</span>
      <span class="na">timeout</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">TIMEOUTS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">TIME_ENTRIES</span>
    <span class="p">});</span>

    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">requestTime</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Date</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="nx">startTime</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">statusCode</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">response</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getResponseCode</span><span class="p">();</span>

    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">statusCode</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">JSON</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">parse</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">response</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getContentText</span><span class="p">());</span>
      <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">entries</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">data</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">time_entries</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="p">[];</span>

      <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`✅ Usuário </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">userId</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2"> entries (</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">requestTime</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">ms)`</span><span class="p">);</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">;</span>
      <span class="p">}</span>
    <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">statusCode</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="mi">429</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="nx">retryCount</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="nx">maxRetries</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`⏳ Rate limiting usuário </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">userId</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">, tentativa </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">retryCount</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">/</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">maxRetries</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
      <span class="nx">Utilities</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">sleep</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">500</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">retryCount</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">));</span> <span class="c1">// Backoff reduzido</span>
      <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nf">fetchTimeEntriesForUser</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">userId</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">retryCount</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">statusCode</span> <span class="o">!==</span> <span class="mi">404</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`⚠️ Erro </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">statusCode</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2"> para usuário </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">userId</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">[];</span>
  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">retryCount</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="nx">maxRetries</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`🔄 Retry </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">retryCount</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">/</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">maxRetries</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2"> para usuário </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">userId</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
      <span class="nx">Utilities</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">sleep</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">300</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">retryCount</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">));</span> <span class="c1">// Backoff reduzido</span>
      <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nf">fetchTimeEntriesForUser</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">userId</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">retryCount</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`❌ Erro final para usuário </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">userId</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">[];</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Busca time entries diretamente por usuários configurados (otimizado com paralelização)
 * @param {string} date - Data para buscar
 * @returns {Array} Array de time entries do Redmine
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">fetchTimeEntriesByUsersAndDateOptimized</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">allEntries</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[];</span>
  <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">foundAnyData</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">;</span>

  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`🔍 Buscando time entries na data </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">...`</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="c1">// Processa usuários em lotes maiores para melhor performance</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">batchSize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// Aumentado para 4 usuários</span>
  <span class="k">for </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="nx">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="nx">ASSIGNED_TO_IDS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="nx">i</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="nx">batchSize</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">batch</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">ASSIGNED_TO_IDS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">slice</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">i</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">batchSize</span><span class="p">);</span>

    <span class="c1">// Processa lote em paralelo (simulado)</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">batchResults</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">batch</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">map</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">userId</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> 
      <span class="nf">fetchTimeEntriesForUser</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">userId</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="p">);</span>

    <span class="c1">// Consolida resultados do lote</span>
    <span class="nx">batchResults</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">forEach</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">entries</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="nx">allEntries</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">allEntries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">concat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">);</span>
        <span class="nx">foundAnyData</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">;</span>
      <span class="p">}</span>
    <span class="p">});</span>

    <span class="c1">// Pausa reduzida entre lotes para melhor performance</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">i</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">batchSize</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="nx">ASSIGNED_TO_IDS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">Utilities</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">sleep</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">);</span> <span class="c1">// Reduzido para 200ms</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">foundAnyData</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📊 Total encontrado: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">allEntries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2"> entries`</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📊 Nenhum entry encontrado na data </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">allEntries</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Busca time entries de uma data específica
 * @param {string} date - Data no formato YYYY-MM-DD
 * @returns {Array} Array de time entries do Redmine
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">fetchTimeEntriesByDate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📅 Buscando time entries para </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">...`</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nf">fetchTimeEntriesByUsersAndDateOptimized</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Função de teste para debug de time entries
 * @param {string} date - Data no formato YYYY-MM-DD (opcional, usa ontem se não informada)
 * @returns {Object} Resultado detalhado do teste
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">testTimeEntries</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">date</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">testDate</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">date</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nf">getYesterdayDateString</span><span class="p">();</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`🧪 TESTE: Buscando time entries para </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">testDate</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>

    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">url</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_TIME_ENTRIES_URL</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">.json?key=</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_API_KEY</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">&amp;spent_on=</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">testDate</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">&amp;limit=</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">LIMITS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">TIME_ENTRIES</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`🔗 URL de teste: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">url</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>

    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">UrlFetchApp</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">fetch</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="na">muteHttpExceptions</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">headers</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Content-Type</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">application/json</span><span class="dl">"</span> <span class="p">},</span>
    <span class="p">});</span>

    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">statusCode</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">response</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getResponseCode</span><span class="p">();</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">responseText</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">response</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getContentText</span><span class="p">();</span>

    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📊 Status Code: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">statusCode</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📄 Response: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">responseText</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>

    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">statusCode</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">JSON</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">parse</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">responseText</span><span class="p">);</span>
      <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">totalEntries</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">data</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">time_entries</span> <span class="p">?</span> <span class="nx">data</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">time_entries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>

      <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`✅ Sucesso! </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">totalEntries</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2"> time entries encontrados`</span><span class="p">);</span>

      <span class="c1">// Mostra detalhes dos primeiros 3 entries</span>
      <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">data</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">time_entries</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="nx">data</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">time_entries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📋 Primeiros entries:`</span><span class="p">);</span>
        <span class="nx">data</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">time_entries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">slice</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">forEach</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">index</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
          <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`  </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">index</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">. ID: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">id</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">, User: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">user</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">name</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2"> (</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">user</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">id</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">), Hours: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">hours</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
        <span class="p">});</span>
      <span class="p">}</span>

      <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="na">success</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">statusCode</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">totalEntries</span><span class="p">,</span>
