        <span class="na">sampleEntries</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">data</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">time_entries</span> <span class="p">?</span> <span class="nx">data</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">time_entries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">slice</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[],</span>
        <span class="nx">url</span>
      <span class="p">};</span>
    <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`❌ Erro! Status: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">statusCode</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
      <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="na">success</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">statusCode</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="na">error</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">responseText</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nx">url</span>
      <span class="p">};</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>
  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`💥 Exceção: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="na">success</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="na">error</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span>
    <span class="p">};</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Teste específico para o dia 14/07/2025 que sabemos que tem dados
 * @returns {Object} Resultado do teste
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">testSpecificDate</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`🧪 TESTE ESPECÍFICO: Buscando dados do dia 14/07/2025`</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nf">testTimeEntries</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">2025-07-14</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Compara dados de diferentes datas para debug
 * @returns {Object} Comparação de resultados
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">compareDates</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">dates</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">2025-07-14</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">2025-07-15</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">2025-07-16</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">];</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">results</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{};</span>

  <span class="nx">dates</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">forEach</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">date</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`\n🔍 Testando data: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">testTimeEntries</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">});</span>

  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Testa o cálculo de datas para debug
 * @returns {Object} Informações sobre as datas calculadas
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">testDateCalculation</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">🧪 TESTE: Verificando cálculo de datas...</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="c1">// Data atual</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">now</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Date</span><span class="p">();</span>
  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📅 Data/hora atual: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">now</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">toString</span><span class="p">()}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="c1">// Data atual em UTC</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">nowUTC</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">Utilities</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">formatDate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">now</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">UTC</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📅 Data/hora atual (UTC): </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">nowUTC</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="c1">// Data atual no timezone local</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">nowLocal</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">Utilities</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">formatDate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">now</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">Session</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getScriptTimeZone</span><span class="p">(),</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📅 Data/hora atual (Local): </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">nowLocal</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="c1">// Data de ontem em UTC</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">yesterday</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Date</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">now</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nx">yesterday</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">setDate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">now</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getDate</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">yesterdayUTC</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">Utilities</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">formatDate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">yesterday</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">UTC</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">yyyy-MM-dd</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📅 Data de ontem (UTC): </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">yesterdayUTC</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="c1">// Data de ontem no timezone local</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">yesterdayLocal</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">Utilities</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">formatDate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">yesterday</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">Session</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getScriptTimeZone</span><span class="p">(),</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">yyyy-MM-dd</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nx">Logger</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`📅 Data de ontem (Local): </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">yesterdayLocal</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="na">currentTime</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">now</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">toString</span><span class="p">(),</span>
    <span class="na">currentUTC</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">nowUTC</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="na">currentLocal</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">nowLocal</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="na">yesterdayUTC</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">yesterdayUTC</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="na">yesterdayLocal</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">yesterdayLocal</span>
  <span class="p">};</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// FUNÇÕES DE VALIDAÇÃO E CONFIGURAÇÃO</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Valida configuração completa do sistema
 * @returns {Object} Resultado da validação
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">validateSystemConfiguration</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">validation</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="na">success</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="na">errors</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[],</span>
    <span class="na">warnings</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[],</span>
    <span class="na">details</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
  <span class="p">};</span>

  <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="c1">// Valida API Key</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_API_KEY</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">REDMINE_API_KEY</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">YOUR_API_KEY_HERE</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">success</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">errors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">API Key do Redmine não configurada</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">details</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">apiKey</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">✅ Configurada</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="c1">// Valida URLs</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_API_URL</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">REDMINE_API_URL</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">includes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">your-redmine-instance</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">success</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">errors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">URL da API do Redmine não configurada</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">details</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">apiUrl</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">✅ Configurada</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_TIME_ENTRIES_URL</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">REDMINE_TIME_ENTRIES_URL</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">includes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">your-redmine-instance</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">success</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">errors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">URL de Time Entries não configurada</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">details</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">timeEntriesUrl</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">✅ Configurada</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="c1">// Valida IDs de usuários</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">ASSIGNED_TO_IDS</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">ASSIGNED_TO_IDS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">warnings</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">Nenhum ID de usuário configurado</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">details</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">userIds</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">`✅ </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">ASSIGNED_TO_IDS</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2"> usuários configurados`</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="c1">// Valida nomes das planilhas</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">SHEET_NAME</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">CLOSED_SHEET_NAME</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">TIME_ENTRIES_SHEET_NAME</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">warnings</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">Nomes das planilhas não configurados</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">details</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">sheetNames</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">✅ Configurados</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="c1">// Testa conexão com API</span>
    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">success</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">testUrl</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_API_URL</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">.json?key=</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">REDMINE_API_KEY</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">&amp;limit=1`</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">UrlFetchApp</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">fetch</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">testUrl</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span>
          <span class="na">muteHttpExceptions</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">,</span>
          <span class="na">timeout</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">8000</span> <span class="c1">// 8 segundos</span>
        <span class="p">});</span>

        <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">response</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getResponseCode</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
          <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">details</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">apiConnection</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">✅ Conectado</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
          <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">success</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
          <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">errors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`Falha na conexão com API: HTTP </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">response</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getResponseCode</span><span class="p">()}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
        <span class="p">}</span>
      <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">success</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">errors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`Erro na conexão com API: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
      <span class="p">}</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">success</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">errors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`Erro na validação: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">validation</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</code></pre></div></li>
		<li>SheetService <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-503a7215-show, #collapse-503a7215-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-503a7215&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-503a7215-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-503a7215-show, #collapse-503a7215-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-503a7215&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-503a7215-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-503a7215" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><pre><code class="javascript syntaxhl" data-language="javascript"><span class="c1">// SheetService.gs</span>
<span class="c1">// Operações com Google Sheets</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// CONSTANTES DE COLUNAS</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">COLUMN_INDICES</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="c1">// Colunas de data em issues (baseado em 1)</span>
  <span class="na">START_DATE</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">9</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="na">DUE_DATE</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="na">CREATED_ON</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">17</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="na">UPDATED_ON</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">18</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="na">CLOSED_ON</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="c1">// Apenas para issues fechados</span>

  <span class="c1">// Colunas em time entries (baseado em 1)</span>
  <span class="na">HOURS</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="na">DATE</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">8</span>
<span class="p">};</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// FUNÇÕES DE FORMATAÇÃO</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Formata uma string de data para o padrão UTC
 * @param {string} dateString - String de data para formatar
 * @returns {string} Data formatada ou espaço em branco
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">formatDateTime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">dateString</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">dateString</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">dateString</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">;</span>

  <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">date</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Date</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">dateString</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">Utilities</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">formatDate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">date</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">UTC</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">catch </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">;</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Extrai apenas o primeiro nome de uma string completa
 * @param {string} fullName - Nome completo da pessoa
 * @returns {string} Primeiro nome ou string original se inválida
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">getFirstName</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">fullName</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">fullName</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">fullName</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="k">typeof</span> <span class="nx">fullName</span> <span class="o">!==</span> <span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">string</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">;</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="c1">// Remove espaços extras e divide por espaços</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">names</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">fullName</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">trim</span><span class="p">().</span><span class="nf">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sr">/</span><span class="se">\s</span><span class="sr">+/</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="c1">// Retorna o primeiro nome se existir</span>
  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">names</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="p">?</span> <span class="nx">names</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// FUNÇÕES DE CONVERSÃO DE DADOS</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Converte um array de issues em linhas para a planilha
 * @param {Array} issues - Array de issues do Redmine
 * @param {boolean} closedOnly - Se deve incluir data de fechamento
 * @returns {Array} Array de arrays (linhas da planilha)
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">issuesToRows</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issues</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">closedOnly</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">issues</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">map</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">customFields</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">parseCustomFields</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">);</span>

    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">base</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
      <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">id</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">project</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">name</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">tracker</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">name</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">status</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">name</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">priority</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">name</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nf">getFirstName</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">author</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">name</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nf">getFirstName</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">assigned_to</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">name</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">subject</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nf">formatDateTime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">start_date</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nf">formatDateTime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">due_date</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">done_ratio</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">is_private</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">estimated_hours</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">total_estimated_hours</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">spent_hours</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">total_spent_hours</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nf">formatDateTime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">created_on</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nf">formatDateTime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">updated_on</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
      <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">status</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">is_closed</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="kc">true</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">closed_on</span> <span class="p">?</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Sim</span><span class="dl">"</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">Não</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="p">];</span>

    <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">closedOnly</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
      <span class="nx">base</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nf">formatDateTime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">closed_on</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>

    <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">customCols</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">CUSTOM_FIELDS_TO_INCLUDE</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">map</span><span class="p">(</span>
      <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">name</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="nx">customFields</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nx">name</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span> 
    <span class="p">);</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">[...</span><span class="nx">base</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">...</span><span class="nx">customCols</span><span class="p">];</span>
  <span class="p">});</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Cria uma linha vazia baseada nos cabeçalhos
 * @param {boolean} closedOnly - Se deve incluir coluna de fechamento
 * @returns {Array} Array com espaços em branco
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">createEmptyRow</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">closedOnly</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">headers</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">getHeaders</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">closedOnly</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">headers</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">map</span><span class="p">(()</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// FUNÇÕES DE ESCRITA EM PLANILHAS</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Escreve dados de issues em uma planilha específica
 * @param {string} sheetName - Nome da aba da planilha
 * @param {Array} issues - Array de issues para escrever
 * @param {boolean} closedOnly - Se são issues fechados
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">writeToSheet</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">sheetName</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">issues</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">closedOnly</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">false</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">ss</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">SpreadsheetApp</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getActiveSpreadsheet</span><span class="p">();</span>
  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">ss</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="k">throw</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Error</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">Nenhuma planilha ativa encontrada</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">sheet</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">ss</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getSheetByName</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">sheetName</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">sheet</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">sheet</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">ss</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">insertSheet</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">sheetName</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="nx">sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">clear</span><span class="p">();</span>

  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">headers</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">getHeaders</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">closedOnly</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="nx">sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getRange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">headers</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">setValues</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="nx">headers</span><span class="p">]);</span>

  <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">rows</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">issuesToRows</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">issues</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">closedOnly</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">rows</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">rows</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="nf">createEmptyRow</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">closedOnly</span><span class="p">)];</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="c1">// Configura o formato das colunas de data</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">dateColumns</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
    <span class="nx">COLUMN_INDICES</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">START_DATE</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="nx">COLUMN_INDICES</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">DUE_DATE</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="nx">COLUMN_INDICES</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">CREATED_ON</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="nx">COLUMN_INDICES</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">UPDATED_ON</span>
  <span class="p">];</span>
  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">closedOnly</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="nx">dateColumns</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">push</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">COLUMN_INDICES</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">CLOSED_ON</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="nx">sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getRange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">rows</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">headers</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">setValues</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">rows</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="c1">// Define o formato das colunas de data</span>
  <span class="nx">dateColumns</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">forEach</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="nx">col</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">sheet</span>
      <span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getRange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">col</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">rows</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
      <span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">setNumberFormat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">});</span>

  <span class="nx">sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">setFrozenRows</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>
<span class="c1">// FUNÇÕES DE TEMPO GASTO (TIME ENTRIES)</span>
<span class="c1">// ============================================================================</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Converte um array de time entries em linhas para a planilha
 * @param {Array} entries - Array of time entries do Redmine
 * @returns {Array} Array de arrays (linhas da planilha)
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">timeEntriesToRows</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">entries</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">[];</span>

  <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">map</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">[</span>
    <span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">id</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">project</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">name</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">issue</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">id</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="nf">getFirstName</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">user</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">name</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">activity</span><span class="p">?.</span><span class="nx">name</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">hours</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">comments</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="nx">entry</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">spent_on</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="p">]);</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="cm">/**
 * Escreve dados de time entries em uma planilha específica
 * @param {string} sheetName - Nome da aba da planilha
 * @param {Array} entries - Array de time entries para escrever
 */</span>
<span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nf">writeTimeEntriesToSheet</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">sheetName</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">ss</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">SpreadsheetApp</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getActiveSpreadsheet</span><span class="p">();</span>
  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">ss</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="k">throw</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nc">Error</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="s1">Nenhuma planilha ativa encontrada</span><span class="dl">'</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">sheet</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">ss</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getSheetByName</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">sheetName</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">sheet</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">sheet</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">ss</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">insertSheet</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">sheetName</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="nx">sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">clear</span><span class="p">();</span>

  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">headers</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">getTimeEntriesHeaders</span><span class="p">();</span>
  <span class="nx">sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getRange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">headers</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">setValues</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="nx">headers</span><span class="p">]);</span>

  <span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">rows</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nf">timeEntriesToRows</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">);</span>

  <span class="k">if </span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">rows</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getRange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">rows</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">headers</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">setValues</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">rows</span><span class="p">);</span>

    <span class="c1">// Formata a coluna de horas</span>
    <span class="nx">sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getRange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">COLUMN_INDICES</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">HOURS</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">rows</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">setNumberFormat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">0.00</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>

    <span class="c1">// Formata a coluna de data</span>
    <span class="nx">sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getRange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">COLUMN_INDICES</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">DATE</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">rows</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">setNumberFormat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2">yyyy-mm-dd</span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="c1">// Escreve uma linha vazia se não houver dados</span>
    <span class="nx">sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">getRange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">headers</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nf">setValues</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="nx">headers</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">map</span><span class="p">(()</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="dl">"</span><span class="s2"> </span><span class="dl">"</span><span class="p">)]);</span>
  <span class="p">}</span>

  <span class="nx">sheet</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nf">setFrozenRows</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
</code></pre></div></li>
		<li>Informar API_KEY como environment no AppScript <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-ea71b591-show, #collapse-ea71b591-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-ea71b591&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-ea71b591-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-ea71b591-show, #collapse-ea71b591-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-ea71b591&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-ea71b591-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-ea71b591" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/320181/clipboard-202507161649-8cxwr.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></li>
	</ul></li>
	</ul>
<hr />
<a name="Manual_módulo_serviços" />
<a name="Manual_módulo_serviços_-Etapas-do-Processo-de-Faturamento-de-Serviços"></a>
<h2 >🧭 Etapas do Processo de Faturamento de Serviços<a href="#Manual_módulo_serviços_-Etapas-do-Processo-de-Faturamento-de-Serviços" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h2>


	<ul>
	<li>Entendendo o Fluxo de ponta a ponta resumido de um armazém <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-015e9b58-show, #collapse-015e9b58-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-015e9b58&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-015e9b58-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-015e9b58-show, #collapse-015e9b58-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-015e9b58&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-015e9b58-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-015e9b58" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/321826/clipboard-202507291641-ce5gi.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></li>
		<li>Entendendo como funciona o Fluxo de cálculo de serviço de ponta a ponta de forma resumida no sistema SIA Armazem <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-6aa064d4-show, #collapse-6aa064d4-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-6aa064d4&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-6aa064d4-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-6aa064d4-show, #collapse-6aa064d4-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-6aa064d4&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-6aa064d4-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-6aa064d4" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/321824/clipboard-202507291639-itqgp.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></li>
	</ul>


<strong>1. Ocorrências de serviço</strong>
	<ul>
	<li> <a class="wiki-page" href="#Compreendendo_-_Ocorrência_de_serviço">Compreendendo - Ocorrência de serviço</a></li>
	</ul>


<strong>2. Cálculo dos Serviços</strong>
	<ul>
	<li><a class="wiki-page" href="#Compreendendo_-_Calcular_Serviços">Compreendendo - Calcular Serviços</a>
	<ul>
	<li><a class="wiki-page" href="#Compreendendo_-_Apagar_Serviços_Calculados">Compreendendo - Apagar Serviços Calculados</a> (caso seja necessário corrigir)</li>
	</ul></li>
	</ul>


<strong>3. Antes de faturar vamos emitir o relatório previsão de faturamento para registrar o antes</strong> 
	<ul>
	<li><a class="wiki-page" href="#Antes_-_Previsão_de_Faturamento">Antes - Previsão de Faturamento</a></li>
	</ul>


<strong>4. Faturamento</strong>
	<ul>
	<li><a class="wiki-page" href="#Compreendendo_-_Faturar_Serviços">Compreendendo - Faturar Serviços</a></li>
	</ul>


<strong>5. Validação e Revisão dos Cálculos</strong>
	<ul>
	<li><a class="wiki-page" href="#Compreendendo_-_Ficha_de_Serviço">Compreendendo - Ficha de Serviço</a></li>
	</ul>


<strong>6. Validação, relatório, previsão de faturamento parcial e total</strong> 
	<ul>
	<li><a class="wiki-page" href="#Depois_Previsão_de_Faturamento_Parcial">Depois Previsão de Faturamento Parcial</a></li>
		<li><a class="wiki-page" href="#Depois_-_Previsão_de_Faturamento_Total">Depois - Previsão de Faturamento Total</a></li>
	</ul>


<strong>7. Ficha de serviço</strong>
	<ul>
	<li><a class="wiki-page" href="#Validando_-_Ficha_de_Serviço">Validando - Ficha de Serviço</a></li>
	</ul>


<strong>8. Emissão do espelho para Nota Fiscal de serviço</strong>
	<ul>
	<li><a class="wiki-page" href="#Compreendendo_-_Nota_Fiscal_de_Serviço">Compreendendo - Nota Fiscal de Serviço</a></li>
	</ul>


	<a name="Manual_módulo_serviços_Relatórios-de-Apoio"></a>
<h3 >Relatórios de Apoio<a href="#Manual_módulo_serviços_Relatórios-de-Apoio" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<ul>
	<li><strong>Notas Fiscais de Serviço</strong> - Relatório Detalhado <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-4b71227e-show, #collapse-4b71227e-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-4b71227e&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-4b71227e-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-4b71227e-show, #collapse-4b71227e-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-4b71227e&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-4b71227e-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-4b71227e" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/321815/clipboard-202507291618-tjrhc.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></li>
		<li><strong>Previsão de Faturamento</strong> - Relatório Detalhado / Simplificado <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-6cad9f72-show, #collapse-6cad9f72-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-6cad9f72&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-6cad9f72-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-6cad9f72-show, #collapse-6cad9f72-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-6cad9f72&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-6cad9f72-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-6cad9f72" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/321816/clipboard-202507291619-mq4ed.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></li>
		<li><strong>Serviços Prestados</strong> - Relatório Simplificado <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-9fbef8d1-show, #collapse-9fbef8d1-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-9fbef8d1&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-9fbef8d1-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-9fbef8d1-show, #collapse-9fbef8d1-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-9fbef8d1&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-9fbef8d1-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-9fbef8d1" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/321818/clipboard-202507291622-qttkm.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></li>
		<li><strong>Serviços Prestados Analítico - SIA Config</strong> - Relatorio Detalhado <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-34c9d5d8-show, #collapse-34c9d5d8-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-34c9d5d8&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-34c9d5d8-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-34c9d5d8-show, #collapse-34c9d5d8-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-34c9d5d8&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-34c9d5d8-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-34c9d5d8" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/321819/clipboard-202507291622-k6i4f.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></li>
		<li><strong>Mapa de Cálculo de Serviços - SIA Config</strong> - Relatorio Detalhado <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-5231a728-show, #collapse-5231a728-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-5231a728&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-5231a728-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-5231a728-show, #collapse-5231a728-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-5231a728&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-5231a728-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-5231a728" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/321820/clipboard-202507291624-xnjdx.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></li>
	</ul>

<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API" />
<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_Manual-de-Configuração-de-Balança-API"></a>
<h1 >Manual de Configuração de Balança API<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_Manual-de-Configuração-de-Balança-API" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h1>


	<p><strong>Atualizado:</strong> 09/10/2025 | <strong>Autor:</strong> Luan Silva</p>


<hr />


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_1-Validações-Iniciais"></a>
<h2 ><span style="color:green;">1. Validações Iniciais</span><a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_1-Validações-Iniciais" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h2>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_11-Dados-da-Balança"></a>
<h3 >1.1 Dados da Balança<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_11-Dados-da-Balança" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<ul>
	<li>Confirmar com o cliente: <strong>Velocidade, Paridade, Bits de Dados e Bits de Parada.</strong></li>
	</ul>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_12-Teste-no-HyperTerminal"></a>
<h3 >1.2 Teste no HyperTerminal<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_12-Teste-no-HyperTerminal" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<ul>
	<li>Testar as configurações em cada porta COM disponível até identificar a correta.</li>
	</ul>


	<p><strong>Diretório:</strong> <code>\\192.168.1.14\Instaladores\Workstation\hyperterminal</code></p>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_13-Instalação-do-Serviço"></a>
<h3 >1.3 Instalação do Serviço<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_13-Instalação-do-Serviço" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<ul>
	<li>Identificar arquitetura (64 ou 32 bits)
	<ul>
	<li>Vá no menu iniciar do Windows digite "Sistema" <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-39e4a345-show, #collapse-39e4a345-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-39e4a345&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-39e4a345-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-39e4a345-show, #collapse-39e4a345-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-39e4a345&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-39e4a345-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-39e4a345" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/328590/clipboard-202510141615-koatl.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
		<li>Copiar pasta correspondente para C:\</li>
		<li>Validar se o arquivo JSON está vazio <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-6cc9ae43-show, #collapse-6cc9ae43-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-6cc9ae43&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-6cc9ae43-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Prints</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-6cc9ae43-show, #collapse-6cc9ae43-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-6cc9ae43&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-6cc9ae43-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Prints</span></a><div id="collapse-6cc9ae43" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/328591/clipboard-202510141616-osryi.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></li>
	</ul>


	<p><strong>Diretório:</strong> <code>\\192.168.1.14\Distribuicao\Serviço de Balança API</code></p>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_14-Permissões"></a>
<h3 >1.4 Permissões<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_14-Permissões" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<ul>
	<li>Pasta ServidorBalancaWeb > Propriedades > Segurança > Editar > Adicionar > "Todos" > Marcar "Controle Total" > OK <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-bfa70bdd-show, #collapse-bfa70bdd-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-bfa70bdd&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-bfa70bdd-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-bfa70bdd-show, #collapse-bfa70bdd-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-bfa70bdd&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-bfa70bdd-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-bfa70bdd" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/328592/clipboard-202510141617-bilws.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></li>
	</ul>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_15-Executar-Serviço"></a>
<h3 >1.5 Executar Serviço<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_15-Executar-Serviço" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<p>CMD como Administrador > navegar até diretório > executar serviço <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-c5ec6d20-show, #collapse-c5ec6d20-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-c5ec6d20&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-c5ec6d20-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Print</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-c5ec6d20-show, #collapse-c5ec6d20-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-c5ec6d20&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-c5ec6d20-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Print</span></a><div id="collapse-c5ec6d20" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/328594/clipboard-202510141619-xwsu1.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /><br /><img src="/attachments/download/328593/clipboard-202510141619-sqbwp.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></p>


<hr />


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_2-Configurações-no-SIA"></a>
<h2 ><span style="color:green;">2. Configurações no SIA</span><a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_2-Configurações-no-SIA" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h2>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_21-Módulo-de-Configuração"></a>
<h3 >2.1 Módulo de Configuração<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_21-Módulo-de-Configuração" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<p>Abrir Configuração de Balança. <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-d6b5514b-show, #collapse-d6b5514b-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-d6b5514b&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-d6b5514b-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Exibir</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-d6b5514b-show, #collapse-d6b5514b-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-d6b5514b&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-d6b5514b-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Omitir</span></a><div id="collapse-d6b5514b" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/328595/clipboard-202510141622-scgd2.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></p>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_22-Validar-Balanças-Existentes"></a>
<h3 >2.2 Validar Balanças Existentes<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_22-Validar-Balanças-Existentes" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<p>Verificar se já existe balança com o mesmo "Nome do Servidor" da máquina atual. <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-e5f1cf51-show, #collapse-e5f1cf51-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-e5f1cf51&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-e5f1cf51-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Print</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-e5f1cf51-show, #collapse-e5f1cf51-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-e5f1cf51&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-e5f1cf51-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Print</span></a><div id="collapse-e5f1cf51" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/328596/clipboard-202510141623-nyr9o.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></p>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_23-Incluir-Nova-Balança"></a>
<h3 >2.3 Incluir Nova Balança<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_23-Incluir-Nova-Balança" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<p>Clicar em "Incluir".</p>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_24-Aba-Balança"></a>
<h3 >2.4 Aba "Balança"<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_24-Aba-Balança" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<table>
		<tr>
			<td> Campo </td>
			<td> Valor </td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td> Tipo de Cancela </td>
			<td> Sem Cancela </td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td> Gravar Imagem </td>
			<td> Não </td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td> Porta </td>
			<td> 15704 </td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td> Tipo de Balança </td>
			<td> Servidor balança API </td>
		</tr>
	</table>




	<p><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-115a1778-show, #collapse-115a1778-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-115a1778&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-115a1778-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Print</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-115a1778-show, #collapse-115a1778-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-115a1778&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-115a1778-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Print</span></a><div id="collapse-115a1778" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/328603/clipboard-202510141752-8vwqc.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></p>


	<p><strong>Antes de prosseguir:</strong> Parar serviço no CMD (Ctrl+C)</p>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_25-Aba-Servidor-balança-API"></a>
<h3 >2.5 Aba "Servidor balança API"<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_25-Aba-Servidor-balança-API" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<table>
		<tr>
			<td> Campo </td>
			<td> Valor </td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td> Tipo de Balança </td>
			<td> Serial </td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td> Porta Proxy </td>
			<td> 0 </td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td> Dias de dump </td>
			<td> 10 </td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td> Pasta dump </td>
			<td> DumpBalanca </td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td> Fator Instabilidade KG </td>
			<td> 10 </td>
		</tr>
	</table>




	<p><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-84fe8760-show, #collapse-84fe8760-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-84fe8760&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-84fe8760-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Print</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-84fe8760-show, #collapse-84fe8760-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-84fe8760&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-84fe8760-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Print</span></a><div id="collapse-84fe8760" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/328605/clipboard-202510141753-sdpqm.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></p>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_26-Aba-Conexão-Serial"></a>
<h3 >2.6 Aba "Conexão Serial"<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_26-Aba-Conexão-Serial" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<p>Preencher dados testados no HyperTerminal > Clicar "Detectar" > Aguardar "CONCLUÍDO COM ÊXITO" <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-f4a5b894-show, #collapse-f4a5b894-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-f4a5b894&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-f4a5b894-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Print</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-f4a5b894-show, #collapse-f4a5b894-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-f4a5b894&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-f4a5b894-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Print</span></a><div id="collapse-f4a5b894" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/328606/clipboard-202510141754-mkhpd.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></p>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_27-Diagnóstico"></a>
<h3 >2.7 Diagnóstico<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_27-Diagnóstico" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<p>Aba "Balança" > Clicar "Diagnóstico" <a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-927eff2b-show, #collapse-927eff2b-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-927eff2b&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-927eff2b-show" class="icon icon-collapsed collapsible"><svg class="s18 icon-svg icon-rtl" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-right"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Print</span></a><a href="#" onclick="$(&#39;#collapse-927eff2b-show, #collapse-927eff2b-hide&#39;).toggle(); $(&#39;#collapse-927eff2b&#39;).fadeToggle(150);; return false;" id="collapse-927eff2b-hide" class="icon icon-expanded collapsible" style="display:none;"><svg class="s18 icon-svg" aria-hidden="true"><use href="/assets/icons-35b4b65e.svg#icon--angle-down"></use></svg><span class="icon-label">Print</span></a><div id="collapse-927eff2b" class="collapsed-text" style="display:none;"><p><img src="/attachments/download/328607/clipboard-202510141754-ppdn6.png" alt="" loading="lazy" /></p></div></p>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_28-Validação-de-Peso"></a>
<h3 >2.8 Validação de Peso<a href="#Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_28-Validação-de-Peso" class="wiki-anchor">&para;</a></h3>


	<p>Marcar "Detalhada" > Detectar > Parar > Selecionar combinação > Aplicar > Fechar</p>


	<p><strong>Importante:</strong> Testar com peso alto (5-6 dígitos) para validar precisão.</p>


	<p><strong>Antes de prosseguir:</strong> Iniciar serviço no CMD</p>


	<a name="Manual_para_Configuração_de_Balança_API_29-Finalizar-Criação"></a>
